name: The Last Star Fighter Amiga
description:
'The Last Star Fighter 2.0   Feb 2020  

      By AMITEN SOFTWARE (c)2020

  

'2nd Winner in AmigameJam2016 compo.

'Game Design: Johnny Acevedo  (Amiten) 

'Game Programming : Johnny Acevedo  (Amiten)   

'Music      : Sebastian Abreu (Tacha) 

'Sound FX   : Johnny Acevedo  (Amiten) 

'Pixel Art Sprite assets: Wayne Ashworth

'Box Art & Design: Johnny Acevedo  (Amiten) 

' Intro Digitized Images from : Universal Pictures - Lorimar 

' original intro sound :  Craig Safan Adapted by Tacha

' All right reserved to Universal Pictures and Lorimar

' This Game is  Freeware.

' Not Comercial! - this will be not sold in any circustances.

' A new shoot´em up for Amiga Computers.

'

Requirements:

All Amigas With 1MB Chip Ram and a Floppy Disk Drive.

If you want to run it from the hard drive, simply copy the executables 

that are on each floppy disk into a drawer of your hard drive.

Compatible with Ntsc Amigas and Pal Amigas

The Game is a Fan tribute to Famous 80´s Film "The last StarFighter" 

Was created in a Real Amiga 1200 with Blizzard 1230 with HardDrive and Workbench 3.1.

Technically information

Original in Game music where we use 1 Mod 3 channels.

Original Pixel Graphics made in Deluxe Paint.

Original Sound Effects.

Smooth Scroll at 50 hz on a Stock 68000 CPU 7.14mhz 

Ad Pro was used for convert the digitized movie pics.

Note:

Coders gonna Code.

Haters gonna hate.

Trolls gonna trolling.

Stay creative forever!

Johnny Acevedo (Amiten)

                  The Last Star Fighter Amiga 2020
